            "message": "S%C3%B3c%20un%20nou%20usuari",
            "user": 5,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T10:41:47.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T10:41:47.000Z",

        },
        {
            "id": 185,
            "message": "S%C3%AD..",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T10:33:44.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T10:33:44.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 184,
            "message": "%C3%89s%20cosa%20del%20refresh%3F",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T10:33:37.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T10:33:37.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 183,
            "message": "%C3%89s%20cosa%20del%20refresh...",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T10:33:26.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T10:33:26.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 178,
            "message": "puc%20escriure%20el%20missatge%20normal",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T10:09:10.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T10:09:10.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 119,
            "message": "Escric que li surti una alerta\n",
            "user": 2,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T09:34:18.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T09:34:18.000Z",
            "User.name": "Oriol"
        },
        {
            "id": 118,
            "message": "Sí que escric al principal.\n",
            "user": 2,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T09:32:27.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T09:32:27.000Z",
            "User.name": "Oriol"
        },
        {
            "id": 117,
            "message": "Ah, sñi!\n",
            "user": 2,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T09:30:47.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T09:30:47.000Z",
            "User.name": "Oriol"
        },
        {
            "id": 116,
            "message": "però la principal no.. ?\n",
            "user": 2,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-08T09:30:44.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-08T09:30:44.000Z",
            "User.name": "Oriol"
        },
        {
            "id": 98,
            "message": "Nou missatge",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-06T08:38:22.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-06T08:38:22.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 94,
            "message": "Ara sí!",
            "user": 2,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:55:32.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:55:32.000Z",
            "User.name": "Oriol"
        },
        {
            "id": 93,
            "message": "Puc enviar missatge amb l'enter?",
            "user": 2,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:55:26.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:55:26.000Z",
            "User.name": "Oriol"
        },
        {
            "id": 92,
            "message": "Sorolls d'x-files, sí",
            "user": 2,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:48:42.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:48:42.000Z",
            "User.name": "Oriol"
        },
        {
            "id": 91,
            "message": "Sons estranys",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:48:13.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:48:13.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 85,
            "message": "Ombra",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:26:17.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:26:17.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 84,
            "message": "Un missatge nou",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:24:35.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:24:35.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 83,
            "message": "Vibra amb ombra, tot..",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:22:06.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:22:06.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 82,
            "message": "V",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T09:21:49.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T09:21:49.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
        },
        {
            "id": 78,
            "message": "nou missatge",
            "user": 1,
            "room": 1,
            "createdAt": "2023-03-02T08:57:27.000Z",
            "updatedAt": "2023-03-02T08:57:27.000Z",
            "User.name": "Admin"
